# FP&A â€“ Budgeting Guidelines

## Budgeting Principles
- Budgets must align with approved planning cycles.
- Budget ownership and accountability must be explicit.
- Budget changes must follow formal approval processes.

## Control Rules
- Budget baselines must be preserved.
- Adjustments must be versioned and justified.
- Budget roll-ups must be consistent and reconcilable.

## Forbidden
- Unapproved budget modifications
- Retroactive budget changes without trace
- Hidden offsets or balancing entries
